description: [Mustard Tempest](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1020) has used the filename `AutoUpdater.js` to mimic legitimate update files and has also used the Cyrillic homoglyph characters С `(0xd0a1)` and а `(0xd0b0)`, to produce the filename `Сhrome.Updаte.zip`.(Citation: Red Canary SocGholish March 2024)(Citation: SocGholish-update)
